title.value: Influence of parameters of replaceable distributing devices to the hydrothrower on range of flight and uniformity of distribution of the stream of suspension
Влияние параметров сменных распределительных устройств к гидрометателю на дальность полета и равномерность распределения струи суспензии

person.name: Kondratyev, V.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation
Samburskij, G.A., Lomonosov Moscow State Academy of Fine Chemical Technology
Sviridovich, T.G., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation (Russian Federation)
Naporko, Yu.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Theoretical and experimental results of the research of the influence of the parameters of replaceable distributing device of the hydro-thrower on the range of flight of a stream of suspension are reflected in the article. The scheme of experimental hydro-thrower with adjustable end cap and the drawing of the different adjustable end caps themselves are shown. The scheme of suspension distribution in laboratory conditions is displayed. Factors, influencing the transport range of the suspension stream along with distribution of the suspension are researched. The results of verification of the mathematic model and its influence on available accuracy are presented. Matrix of multifactor experiment and the results of the research of uniformity of suspension distribution are displayed. The graphs of uniformity of suspension distribution with the help of adjustable end caps of different diameters are shown. The results of determination of the uniformity of suspension distribution in working conditions are presented. The data provided in the research are recommended to be used for the design and operation of technical means after service and repair of ameliorative systems, dams, slopes of roads and grassy lawns.
